1265:7: śrīmat jñānaśrīmitrapādīyamuktasāmarthyāsāmarthyātprasphuṭita upaśaṅkātaḥ sāmarthyāsāmarthyaviruddhadharmasaṃsargeṇa bhedasiddhau tatsiddhiriti sattvādiṣupareṇaśleṣitaṃ kliśyate|
1265:9: hi pālanā pratyakṣataḥ pṛthvīpavanapāśraḥ pratyarthivījāni parasparopasarpaṇasampūrṇapratyayapratyarjitasannidhānāni tadudbhūtasvādhīnavarddhiṣṇutādiguṇaramaṇīyapariṇatyā pravardhante (4)
1265:13: gapadyaviśeṣasauṣṭhavasphuṭitamupādhāvagrimakṣaṇasyāpi sahakārisākalyāsākalyāvasthayoḥ sthitāsthitatayā prarohaṃ prati pratyetuṃ pāryeta|
1265:15: dhikatcāt sahakārikṣaṇakrameṇa kedārākrāntakalevaraṃ kadambakamekamanekambeti vistarata vicāracakramapakramante|
1265:17: thitamidamuttānīkrameṇa sahakārisahacaritapratyayapratyāsattibhrāntasvabhāvāntaramintyupakṣipya pakṣapratipakṣapa- rijighṛkṣākṣāntahṛdayā sādhakamidamiti jñāpakavirodhe vyāharanti|
1265:18: jighṛkṣāsāmarthyasamarthanādau sākṣādvayavahatuṃ tattadā tatkarotyādi tatkarotyeva vā yathā (2)
1265:19: ca yasya nehaḥ sandohaniḥ sandehapariṇatau praṇatidehotkṛṣṭaḥ yathāprakāśitasādhanātattvaprasādhanaśca kevalopi kṣaṇatvapadārthaḥ na ca kevalastathābhū(3)
1265:20: topi karotyapīti karotyeveti vā pratyākalitaḥ sa eṣa prasaṅgaprasaṅgato viparyayaḥ pūrvāparakālamilitakaraṇākaraṇayorādhārabhedañca saṃdīpayati|
1265:21: tathāhi (4) paryavasāne janakatvamabhimatakārye paryālocitaṃ pramāṇena pratyekamavasthitam|
1265:27: bhadantaiḥ paramaparāparasadṛśatā ca svabhāvāntarānubhavitaikapratisantānaṃ bandhyatvamakartṛtvaṃ keśakuntalakamalakāṇḍāt svaravatsaṃvedanīyam|
1265:28: tat(8) tapanādisahacarabhedasampāditatattadādibhedo darśyatāṃ pūrvāparāvasthā pāramārthikā bhedajñā pratyabhijñā paramaviśvāsasarvasvaṃ bibhrati bhramimūrṣaṇīyeti|
1265:29: pakṣa dva-(9) yānugrahanigrahe hetuḥ hetubhāva eva bhāvanāṃ saṃdūṣyate bhavyena|
1265:30: tathāhi, tatkartṛtvaṃ pareṣu madhyasthamiva vādiprativādisammatabilambakāritvāt sapakṣāditvaviśeṣasiddhiviśleṣe'pi suśleṣakauśalabalābalambīvānumatamubhayabhūmibhāginorapi bhāvato bhūtoktipravṛttayostathābhūtañca bhāvyamānaṃ kartṛtvarūpaṃ kiṃ tattvato'tyantāyogavyavacchinnanirvartmathābhūtañca bhāvyamānaṃ kartṛtvarūpaṃ kiṃ tattvato'tyantāyogavyavacchinnanirvartmakartṛtvarūpamucchavibhramabhūmi - bhūtānubhavavyavasthānamanavasthitamapi anumanyate mānyena anyena vā prakāreṇa yadutāyogavyavacchinnakartṛ -(3)
1265:33: arthagṛ(4)hītau-paryāyato dvāvapi dvāparadvārālaṅkṛtau kathaya ko'tra nistrāṇamāpadyate avadyaprabheda iti ceducyate|
1265:35: yatsamarthavyavasthānasthānaṃ tattadā tatkarotyapi yathā sāmagryavasthāyāṃ vikalakālakalāyāmapi pūrvādikāyāmakathitasāmarthyavyavasthānaṃ sthānañca (6)
1265:36: kāñcanakāryamaryādāmādāya darśito bhāvabhedaḥ ityantāyogavyavacchedakartṛtvapakṣe lakṣayitavyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ|
1265:38: hakāricakraḥ prakramamāṇaḥ kartu matyantāyogavyavacchedena abhimato bhāvaḥ svakāryamityāvarjanīyo viparyayaścātra|
1265:42: sahakārisākalye satyeva karotīti vilambakāritvalakṣaṇaśca kevalāvasthāyāṃ prasajjayitumaśakyatvāt|
1265:43: sahakā-(2) risākalye sati karotyevetyevaṃ svabhāvakartutvakīrtane'kīrtiḥ karitalabilambitaiva sthiviravādānukulatvātkukṣitvādasya pakṣasya hantanitāntanirmalaiḥ subhāṣitabhānubhiranunnameva pareṣāṃ mohatamaḥ|
1265:44: yadevaṃ sākalyaṃ sahakārikalpaṃ bījakartṛtvaviśeṣaṇaṃ prakṣipya parapakṣaḥ kṣubhyate'kṣepakāritvamapi tadviśe(4)
1265:45: ṣarūpaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhaṃ anurudhya bādhyate sādhuḥ yasmādakṣepakāritvānapekṣakāritvaṃ kartṛtvasāmānyasyāntyāvasthāyāṃ pratyakṣānupalambhasambhāvita (5)
1265:46: sya vyaktiprabhedatayā vyāpakaṃ sambhāvya prakārāntarāpratīteranakṣepakartṛtvarūpaṃ kartṛtvasāmānyasya pariṇāmamanumanyase prasaṅgasaṅgatau (6)
1265:48: tathāhi hetusāhitye'pi bījasya kartṛtvaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ na sāhityena viśeṣaṇīyaṃ śilāśakalāderapi tathātvaprāpteḥ apitu kevalyai (7)
1265:49: va bījasya pratyekamavasthitaṃ anvayavyatirekayoravagamena pāṣāṇakulasya sāhityabahirbhāvabhajanāt|
1265:50: pratyekatvañca na ca viśiṣyamāṇaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bīja-(8)
1265:51: -sya pratyekatvābhāvasvabhāvo' pratyekarūpaḥ sahakāricakrasaṃparkaḥ kathaṃ viśeṣaṃ śaknuyāt nahi cakṣurnāsti tena ca viśiṣṭamiti śiṣṭeṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ|
1265:52: athāpi pra (9) tyekatvasya sāhitye pratyekamanvayādergṛhītau nāpratyekatvena viśiṣyata taduttarakālaṃ punarviśeṣaṇīyaṃ etāvanti sahakārīṇi sahitāni hi tā ni kāryāyeti pāṭhāntara aparahastena sāmagrīmīhamāno mānocitastāmevādatte sāmagrīpāṣāṇatalākīrṇāmapīti cet n akāraṇavikalpakatvādeva nopādīyate (2)
1265:54: kintayā viśiṣya karaṇīyaṃ yadā tu viśeṣaṇametādṛśaṃ apasāritam|
1265:55: atha tadānīṃ avaśiṣyamāṇaṃ brīhikalevaraṃ kāraṇatvena niṣṭaṅkitena (3)
1265:56: atyantāyogavyacchedānumitau kevalamapi kadācitkarotu sāmagrīsamavagraha kāla iti prasaṅgasaṅkīrṇavataḥ prathano manorathonmatho'yaṃ prārthitodoṣaḥ prārthitaḥ (4)
1265:60: nāpi dvitīyaḥ sā hi sahakārisākalyaṃ yā|
1265:64: hetvasiddhiśca yatsahakārisamavadhānavattaddhi karotyeveti ko nāma nābhyupaiti yamuddaśya|
1265:67: prātisvikī tu yogyatā anvayavyatirekaviṣayībhūtaṃ bījatvaṃ vā syāt tadavāntarajātibhedo vā|
1265:71: netaraḥ tasya kurvatyapi mayānabhyupagamena dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavikalatvāt|
1265:74: sa hi na pratyakṣeṇa anubhūyate tathā'navasāyāt |
1265:79: kiṃ jāti bhedarūpaḥ sahakārilābhālābharūpo veti niyāmakaṃ pramāṇamanusaranto na paśyāmaḥ tathāpi yo'yaṃ sahakārimadhyamadhyāsī no''kṣepakaraṇasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sa yadi prāgapyāsīt tadā prasahya kārya kurvāṇo gīrvāṇaśāpaśatenāpyapahastayituṃ na śakyate, iti cet”|
1265:80: yuktametat yadyakṣepakaraṇasvabhāvatvaṃ bhāvasya pramāṇagocaraḥ syāt kutaḥ tatsiddhamiti cet na vidbhaḥ|
1265:83: evaṃ svabhāvatvasiddhau hi tayo pravṛttistat pravṛttau ca caivaṃ svabhāvatvasiddhiriti|
1265:84: “syādetata kāryajanmaivāsminnarthai pramāṇaṃ vilambakārisvabhāvānuvṛttau kāryānutpatti sarvadeti cet|
1265:88: evaṃ ca kāryajanmasāmagryāṃ pramāṇayituṃ na śakyate na tu jātibhede|
1265:89: te tu kiṃ (5) yathānubhavaṃ parasparasāpekṣā vilambakāritvabhāvāḥ parasparaṃ pratyāsannāḥ kārya kṛtavantaḥ kiṃ vā yathātvaparikalpane kṣiprakārisvabhāvā inyatra (6)
1265:93: (7) tasmād yadyadabhāva eva yanna karoti tattadabhāva tatkarotyeti syāt|
1265:94: etacca sthairyasiddhereva paraṃ bījasarvasvamiti etena samarthavyavahāraocarattvaṃ heturiti nirastam|
1265:104: niyamasya ca sahakārādisākalye satyeva karaṇa karaṇameveti ye evaṃ svabhāvatvenāpyu-patteḥ|
1265:105: tataśca janananimitta evāyaṃ vyavahāro na ca vyāptisiddhiriti|”
1265:110: kartṛtvasāmānyapariṇāmamapi purodhāya dhūrtabrūvasvasvīkaraṇamaśaraṇamārabdhamevaṃ yadyadā yatkaraṇasamarthavyavahārābhyaṅgastaṃ tattadā tatkarotyeva yathāntyāva (4)
1265:115: kāritvānakṣepakāritvalakṣaṇajananajanitaṃ tatsamarthavyavahārayogyatvaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyañcātra karotyapi karotyeveti vā kartṛtvadvayaṃ paryāyato yathā parābhyupagamaṃ svayamapi (7)
1265:118: ṇagaṇasya yadyatkaraṇasamarthavyavaharaṇakāraṇatvābharaṇasya tamupalabdhaṃ tattadākaraṇavat yathāntyāyāṃ daśāyāṃ prākpṛthagavasthāyāmapi bījamajātajaratvamanu(2) matam|
1265:120: na ca nicīyamānamāmnātamapi kadācanāpi kevalaṃ karaṇena duścalakukṣinikṣepādidaśāyāṃ (3)
1265:121: diśopi daśāśeṣā paryaṭatā prāṇivādena pratyekasyāsya janakatvamavadhāritam|
1265:122: ato na paritoṣaḥ sākalyasya svasvabodhena samādhānena ca budhaparārthyasya pratyekami(4)
1265:123: tyaṅgīkaraṇe svābhāvasvābhāvyamabhāvapratiyogitvaṃ tadaiveti sahitaṃ tatraiveti sahitaṃ ubhayasahitaṃ tathaiveti sahitamāsaktamiti svakāṇḍa (5)
1265:124: daṇḍakhaṇḍitāḍambaraṃ svavacanasamvaraṇamapi palāyanaparāgaṇamāpātitamiti vipadeṣā samūladhātacyuti kathaṃ pratikartavyeti|
1265:126: jaladasrāsrudhārāsahasreṇā pi na trāṇamāmaraṇāntamārtakātaratvaravādino varākasyeti sānukrośamapi svāntasantarayati na vādavidhau vācā(7)
1265:128: “(1) tathāhi kastavāyaṃ nyāyaḥ atha etāvatāpi bhāvasya kaḥ svabhāvaḥ samarthito bhavati|
1265:129: nahi pakṣavipakṣābhyāmanyaḥ prakāro'stīti cet na dūṣaṇābhidhānasamaye niścayābhāvenaiva sandigdhāsiddhinirvāhe kathāpūrvarūpaparya (8)
1265:131: ” prasaṅgasādhanaṃ parāmyupagamena vā saṃbhāvyamānatayā vā prakārāntarābhāvāt prastūyate|
1265:132: tatra sandigdhāsiddhatvamuktvā dūṣaṇameva mayaiva nābhyupagatamiti cet taccintyatāṃ kartṛtvamanumanyase tāvad tacca yāvat pūrvasthitameva pratyabhijñāśritya ityāśrayobījātmakaṃ yatkāryamavyapekṣakamanvayavyatirekāsāmarthyāvasthita(2)
1265:133: tathābhāvaṃ tāvadatyantāyogavyavacchedanakartṛtvarupaṃ paryavasitamabhaṅgameva prasaṅgasya kathaṃ saṃdigdhāsiddhadoṣeṇa śoṣayituṃ śakyam|
1265:135: ta bhāgādidantayādhiṣṭhitaṃ bhāgaṃ sākalyagarbbhāvirbhūtaṃ bhāvayitvā sambhāvitaṃ tato'dhiṣṭhitaṃ bhāge'vinirbhāgabhāvinaṃ bhāvato bhāṣyate tadeva bījaṃ pūrvamapyāsīditi (4)
1265:136: tadākṣepakāritvakṣaṇajananajanitasamarthavyavahārayogyatvaṃ prasaṅgasādhanaṃ kathaṃ saṃdigdhāsiddhyā vidhūnanīyaṃ iti na prativādisamāśritottarapakṣapratānakathāpū (5)
1265:139: va bījaṃ kevalaṃ sahakārimadhye'pyavasitakartṛbhāvaṃ prāgapi kurvan tathābhūtamiti bhāvato bhāṣasva susadhisādhibādhanam|
1265:143: kimutpatteranantarameva kṛtiḥ sahakārisamavadhānāntaraṃ vāvilamba iti ko'rthaḥ ?
1265:144: kiṃ yāvanna sahakārisamarthānā samavadhānaṃ tāvadakaraṇaṃ sarva(8)
1265:147: aniścaye dvitīyatṛtīyatoḥ pratyakṣameva pramāṇaṃ bījajātīyasya hi sahakārisamavadhānāntarakara (9)
1265:150: atra ca tavāpi na vigatiḥ eṣa pramāṇasiddhatvāt viparyaye vā dhakācca|
1265:151: tathāhi yadi sahakārivirahe'kurvvāṇastatsamavadhāne'pi na kuryāt tajjātīyamakāraṇameva syāt|
1265:154: virahe'pi kuryāt sahakāriṇo na kāraṇaṃ syuḥ tānantareṇāpi karaṇāt|
1265:159: ta eva (etat) aho apūrvo'yamasya dambhārambhaḥ sa bhramabhūmibhūyiṣṭhabhautabalabhojaphalambhoja sthitaḥ kaṣṭayati bhūtabhāṣaṇabhūṣaṇamapibhrātṛvyasa (5)
1265:160: mupetaṃ tathā he he bhaiṣī ca praṇayaramaṇīyabhāṣaṇabhūmnā svasamānmāyanāmānaṃ arthasārtha sahakārisāhityamaparityajya samarthanaṃ te tatvataḥ sāhityamudāhṛtya tacca tat(6)
1265:162: tathaukteranantaraṃ vyākṛtiniścale kīrtimata saṃkīrtyate ‘sādhanatvena pramāṇaphalaṃ hitat|
1265:163: sati hi (7) kṣaṇakṣīṇatopalakṣaṇena prekṣāvāṃśca kṣaṇiko'kṣepapakṣapramukhānāṃ yathāsukhasukhaṃ lekhayāpi khaṇḍayituṃ duḥśaktam|
1265:165: tasmādācā (8) ryavacanāt tameva śruti-śrutipuṭakena kaṇehṛtya prīyatāṃ prītyā na sa sāhityepi pararupeṇa karttā svarūpañcatasya prāgapīti prāgapi kuryāditi|
1265:168: tathāpi kiṃ asamarthasyaiva sahakārivirahaḥ svarūpalābhānantaraṃ kartureva vā sahakārisamavadhānamanyathā neti ki niyāmaka (10)
1265:169: miti cet ‘idamucyate kuśūlasthabījasyāṃkurānukūlaḥ śilāśakalādviśeṣaḥ kaścidasti na vā,
1265:170: na cenniyamena ekatra pravṛttireva na syānnivṛttiśca tadarthino na syāt paramparayā'ṅkuraprasavasamarthabījakṣaṇajananādastyeveti cet - kadā punaḥ paramparayāpi tathābhūtaṃ kariṣyatīti|
1265:181: tṛtīye tu sarva eva tatsantānāntaḥpātino bījakṣaṇāḥ samānaśīlā prapnuvanti yatra tatra sahakāri (5)
1265:182: samavadhāne sati kṛti niyamāt sarvatra ca sahakārisamavadhānasambhavāt|
1265:186: nādyaḥ śilāśakalādāvapi kṣitisalilatejaḥ pavana yoga(7) darśanāt|
1265:191: āśaṅkayata iti cenna tatsannidhāne satyapi akaraṇavat tadvirahepi karaṇayogamapyāśaṅkyeta āśaṅkyatāmiti cet-tarhi bījavirahe'pi āśaṅkyeta|
1265:194: syādetat na bījādīnāṃ parasparasamavadhānavatāmeva kāryakaraṇamaṅgīkṛtyāśaṅkyate yena samavadhānāniyamā sarveṣāmbā tajjātī yānāmekarasatā niścayaḥ syāt|
1265:195: nāpi yatra tatra samarthopapattimaṅgīkṛtya yena vikalaibhyo'pi kāryajanmasambhāvanāyāṃ pratyakṣānupalambhavirodhaḥsyāt|
1265:198: ” na dṛṣṭasamavadhānamātreṇaiva upapattau tatkalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgaḥ (3)
1265:199: pratihatatvāt atīndriyendriyādivilopaprasaṅgāt kalpanānupapatterviśeṣasya viśeṣaṃprati prayojakatvācceti” - tadapyasāraṃ - bījasyajanmani jananaṃ yena niru(4)
1265:203: ñjasā aṅkurākhyaṃ kṣityādīnāṃ kāryaṃ nyakṣeṇālakṣita tadetasya pariṇatakāraṇaparamparāyāṃ bhindati sa svabhāvo vā bījasvabhāvo'cyutaprācyarūpo vā va (7)
1265:204: stuto'stviti vimarśapūrvakaṃ kharvvagarvabhṛtaḥ prastubate tatrānarthāntarajātibhedānumatirmateḥ puro nāpi prakṛtaprabandhānubandho bauddhānāṃ prasiddhaḥ siddhāntaḥ (8)
1265:206: tadyathā samarthaḥ kutaḥ utpanna iti cet svakāraṇebhyaḥ|
1265:208: kadācidanyathā syāt tataścaikopi kvacijjanayediti cet “aparāparapratyayayogena pratyabhikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ santanvantaḥ saṃskārāḥ yadyapi kutaścetsāmyātsarupāḥ pratiyante tathāpi bhinnaevai ṣāṃ svabhāvastena kiśñcideva kasyacitkāraṇamiti “kasmād” dṛśyāvāntarajātibhedopālambhaḥ sṛgallapallavitaḥ prabalajanavaduttānenāntaḥkaraṇaṃ prīṇāti prā (2)
1265:209: māṇikasya sthūlaparāmarśena hi vijātīyavyāvṛttavījāvarjitaṃ svakāryakāritvamavasthāpitamapi sūkṣmāvāntaraprasaṅgatadviparyayaparyālocanākhya vimarśāntaravṛtyā (3)
1265:210: bījatvādhiṣṭhitasvabhāvaviśeṣapratiṣṭhitaṃ prasādhyate kiṃ tatrānupapannaṃ nāma yathā davīyasi deśe viniveśitātmabhāvaṃ bhāvaṃ vibhāvya vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣavyāvṛttamavadhārayatyavadhā (4)
1265:211: raṇādhvarīṇodbhava janaḥ putraḥ sannidhānādhīnadhīviśeṣeṇa śiṃśapeti tatrāpyete nirūpaṇāt vakrakoṭarapaṭalaghaṭitasskandhasandhiriti svabhāvāntaramavagamya (5)
1265:213: na vā sarvovṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapā na vā sarve ca śiṃśapā vakrakoṭarapaṭalaghaṭitaskandhasandhiriti tathābhūtaṃ prastutama (7)
1265:214: pyastu vastuvyathāvyūhasyāpahateḥ anupahasita eva sādhyāsādhanabhāvaḥ bījatvameva hi sāmānyambidhirūpe'vasthitaṃ akhilāsu vyaktiṣu nāsmākamaṅgīkārago (7)
1265:215: caraḥ punaśca tatrāvāntarādṛśyajātibhedābhyupagamavādo vāvadūkakalpita evamucyate [muhyate] na puñjapuñjena pratyarthitaḥ,
1265:218: yaduta- sa khalu jātiviśeṣaḥ saṃgrāhako vā syāt pratikṣepako vā syāt - evaṃ śālitvamapi saṃgrāhakaṃ carapratikṣepakaṃ vā|
1265:220: yathā vikalpakalpitapratidūṣaṇaprasaraḥ yasmātsmerāsyasarasīruhahārihasitenāpi nārpitasatyaṅkāraḥ kaścidapi vipaścidevaṃ vidhāvāntarajātibhede yādṛśastupa rāparapratyayaprabandhānubandhabodhitaḥ sāmānyasambhave'pi svabhāvabhedastathā prakhyāpitamanantaraṃ sahetu hetuvittasaṃspandanena yatpunaruktirucyate viśeṣasya viśeṣaṃ prati prayo (2)
1265:222: tathāpi yadyapi kutaścit sā syāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhinna evaiṣāṃ svabhāva iti bhāṣayā śālibījatvādhiṣṭhitāntyavyaktilakṣaṇañca (3)
1265:223: vilakṣaṇasvabhāvaviśeṣavibhrānta eva kartṛvādo'ṅkuraṃ pratisthūlaparāmarśavyavasthāpi tatkartṛbhāvabhājaṃ bījadharmmiṇaṃ adhyavasāyasāhityetarayoravasthayoḥ adhikaraṇakara (4)
1265:224: ṇe kalayā kalayitumaśakye virodhākarṣiprasaṅgaṃ tadviparyayapramāṇamaikyaparipanthipaśyatā dṛśyate hi prāmāṇikacakramaulilālitacaraṇayugalānā (5)
1265:226: yathā vā (6) mahīmahīdharādiśaśadharakṛtetarādinā rūpeṇa saṃdigdhamapi dharmapurodhāya sādhanāntareṇa tanute jano jānāti cācaraṇīyacakrabahuviratitattvaṃ yaścāyamu(7)
1265:228: tasmādyo yathābhūto yathābhūtamātmano'nvayavyatirekāvanukārayati tasya tathābhūtasyaiva tathābhūte sāmarthyam,
1265:229: tadviśeṣāstu kāryaviśeṣaṃ prayojayanti śālyādivaditi yuktamutpaśyāma iti mayokto yasmātsthūlāskhalitapratyākalanena aṅkenādāya tasminnaṃśe niḥśaṅkaḥśaṅkaśukopilokaḥ|
1265:233: anyabījajātīyamapi ca kusūlamī lanānuktabījaṃ bījatvena nirūpaṇāt|
1265:234: anayoravasthayoḥ sthitaikasvabhāvatvaṃ viruddhatā prasaṅgādināpramāṇenāha prayojakamātreṇābījatvamāyātīti kena bhāvena bhāṣya-(1)-te|
1265:241: tādṛk tvamapi paryantavatināmeva bījānāmiti dvitīyopi na|
1265:244: abījaparāvṛtyā bījatvaṃ bahutamavyaktisammate'pi pūrvāparakālayorbīje niścāyayiṣyate tena nijāgantukaśaktipakṣo (6)
1265:248: bījaviśeṣa eva hi prayojako na tanmātraṃ bījasya pramāṇavṛtterbalavatvāt|
1265:249: sthūladṛṣṭyā tvevamavasthāpya tāṃ na vyavahārahāniḥ pratibandhasādhanopāyaḥ punaḥ sāpāyaḥ aṅkurasya hi jātiniyamo na tāvannirmittaḥ,
1265:252: nimittavatā vipakṣānnivartamānā svavyāpyamādāya bījaprayojakatāmeva viśrāmyatīti pratibandhasiddhirityevaṃ varṇitā bījatvādhiṣṭhitasvabhāvabhedasyānyāvasthārūpatayā tūpalakṣaṇa (3)
1265:257: na rūḍhakaphalaṃ tat anālokitastattvasthaloti etadeva tvamiti nāsau vyavahāraḥ pāramārthika(5)
1265:258: ityetattadā evamavatārito vicāraḥ kathaṃ prastāvamavavisphūryate tena bījasvabhāvatvaṃ kvacitkārye prayojakatvaṃ na vā ?
1265:262: evaṃ ca pratyakṣasiddhaṃ bīṃjasvabhāvatvannāsti sarvapramāṇāgocarastu viśeṣo'stīti viśuddhā buddhirityupahāsabhāvāpyupahasitabhāva(7)
1265:264: kvacidapyupayoge tvekasya tena rūpeṇa sarveṣāmaviśeṣa tādrūpyāditi|
1265:265: yadyapi kutaścitsāmyātsarūpā pratīyante tathāpi bhinna eva eṣāṃ (8)
1265:266: svabhāvastena kiñcideva kasyacitkāraṇamityanena tathātvaṃ yacca bhāva syāditi kathitaṃ tadapi aprāptasahakārisāhityābhyāṃ viśeṣādipariṇāmalakṣaṇasāmarthyakāraṇa-(9) tvāt|
1265:268: tadeva hi tanna pūrva na paratvāditi kiṃ mukhasyete tasmāṃtpratikṣaṇamaparāparayat kāryānukūlapratyaya sākalyamadhi śayya bījatvamavāntaraṃ svabhāvālambanaṃ samvedyate tadeka kāryaprati tathābhūtaṃ samvedyate tadekakāryaṃ prati tathābhūtaṃ tadeva prayojakamasadvādagrahaḥ yaduktamanena tathā ca (2)
1265:274: sat yatkāryānukūlasahakārimadhyamadhiśete tadā tadeva kāya prati tasya prayojakamiti cet tatkimavāntarajātibhedamupādāya bījasvabhāvenaiveti vā ādye (4)
1265:275: sa eva jātibhedaḥ tatra prayojakaḥ kimāyātaṃ bījatvasya dvitīye tu samānaśīlānāmapi sahakārivikalpādakaraṇamityāyātaṃ tattatsahakāri sā (5)
1265:276: - hitye tattat kāryaṃ prati prayojakasya bījasvabhāvasya sarvasādhāraṇatvāditi|
1265:277: atrāpi prayogaḥ yat yena rūpeṇa arthakriyāsu nopamucyate na tattadrū paṃ yathā bī (6)
1265:278: jaṃ aṅkuratvena na kiṃcidpyakurvan na aṅkurasvarūpaṃ tathā ca śālyādayaḥ sāmagrīṃ praviṣṭādhibījatvenārthakriyāsu upayujyanta iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ (7)
1265:281: tadrūpatvameva tasya pratyakṣasiddhatvādaśakyāpahravamiti cet - astu tarhi vi-(8)-paryayaḥ|
1265:283: yathā svabhāvena sāmagrī niveśino bhāvā bījajātīyārścaite kuśūlasthāsādayaḥ iti svabhāvahetuḥ tadrūpamātrā (9)
1265:284: nubandhitvāt yogyatāyāḥ tataścāsti kiñcitkāryaṃ yatra bījamupajyate|
1265:286: -vat prabandho baddho vā bāla kathaya kutaḥ kutarke tvayā kalitaḥ|
1265:291: - viśvambharādikalāpaḥ sa sabhāgāṅkurakaraṇe samartho hetuḥ yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇāśraya pratyayaviśeṣaḥ (4)
1265:292: sa taddhetujanane samarthaḥ teṣāñca na pūrvaṃ na paścāt na pṛthak bhāva iti samarthānāmapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvabhāvino doṣā nopalīyante|
1265:293: tenaiṣā parasparopasarpaṇādiheturyaḥ samarthaheturiti tasya na kadācidanyathābhāvaḥ|
1265:294: anena (5) nyāyena sarvatra hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ anyānyasvabhāvabhedānvayinīṣu bhāvaśaktiṣu na tu sthiraikabhāveṣu bhāveṣu svabhāvasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavāt (6)
1265:296: anyasahitaḥ karoti cet kiṃ na kevala iti cet kiṃ kevalasya kāryakaraṇe'samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ|
1265:300: rśvakarāni utprekṣyate sāhityamupādhimadhiropya sāmarthyāsāmarthyāpekṣayā prasaṅgatadviparya yapratyāśāṃ śāti bhavān tatrāpyācāryavacanaṃ na sāhityepi para-(9)
1265:301: rūpeṇa kartā svarūpañcāsya prāgapīti prāgapi kuryāt|
1265:302: iti sāhityepi na sāhityaviśeṣaṇaṃ karaṇasāmarthya miti prasaṅgāt|
1265:305: nanu sati kṣaṇabhaṃga bhaṃgireṣāgurugariṣṭhopi śāstrakṛtaḥ tatprasādhakapramāṇaprasaṅgasaṅgatau durgatāṅganādohadalīlāṃ samudvahati picchilatattvatucchānacchārthā sa ya samūrcchalitā pakṣālakalaṅgaṇabharṅginaḥ sādhīyebhyo'pi samyebhyo bībhatsanta iti (2)
1265:306: naitadāścaryaṃ sahasreṇāpi hi niṣpīḍāmavadhānataḥ surapatirakṣāṃ vīkṣyamāṇo na prekṣate'sau sthitasthitasthityādisaṃvidhānādaparadaśāyāṃ bījasya janakatvamiti (3)
1265:307: sthirapakṣe kathamayaṃ niyamo mahanīyatāṃ nīyatāṃ kiṃ svahetudattamaryādatayā sāmagrayepi vā pratyekasāmarthyāsamarthamasahatayā vā paryantapratipannaparyantapratipannasaṃmūrcchanatādi sva-(4)
1265:308: -bhāvahīnatayā vā paripakṣādṛṣṭasadasatkarmanirmāṇanirmūlatayā vā dṛśyate tāvadevamevaṃ te kathamityanarthakaprathamakathā prathanādvā kaścarat purato gacchet svabhraṃ (5)
1265:309: vā svargameveti pakṣāḥ pañcendriyakalpanāt pañca vā upaskṛtasañcitānyaviṣayaniścayanānnādyā manasi vipaścitaḥ praviśati śakyamevamatathyamapi (6)
1265:310: sthāpayituṃ svakāraṇakalāpaparikalpitaṃ cakṣuṣo rūpaṃ yadidaṃ madīyo rūpaṃ ca samavaiti|
1265:311: śabdamatha pratyāsīdantaṃ tadātmanā tulayati aparatrānyevaṃ viṣaye-(7)
1265:312: -'nuśāsanīyamiti tṛpañcatayī kalpanā pāramārthikī syāt grāhyā'rthaviṣayā upadravyaṃ bhāvayituṃ pāryante|
1265:314: pañca vā dhiyaṃ dhatte pañcaprapañcacakṣurādīndriyaprasādāditi tadanantaramaghātapariśīlinamapi (śīlanīyaṃ)
1265:317: karmmanirmāṇanaipuṇyaṃ na pramāṇayatā praṇetavyo vyomāntarjātoyo vījādi bhāva (grāmaḥ)
1265:318: tasya dṛṣṭābhiniviṣṭatve vā kāmaṃ anya pratīkṣo'stu,
1265:319: niyamastu virudhyata iti guruprabādhakapramāṇaprahāraḥ prakṛṣṭa āste|
1265:321: syāt pakṣapūjāviṣkaraṇamātramantimasapakṣe lakṣyate na punaradhikaṃ kiñcit|
1265:322: tasmāt tathā tatkāraṇaṃ vastu tathaiva tadakāraṇam
1265:326: iti prasaṅgatadviparyaya preriṇāprasaraḥ sthiratve sati janakatvena nirṇītasyānti-(4)
1265:327: -ma pariṇāme brīhiviśeṣasyāvicala iti sthitamācāryavacanaṃ tasmāttatsvabhāvasya anyathātvāsambhavāt|
1265:331: atatsvabhāvatve sa prāgiva paścādapi akāraka eva|
1265:334: ahetubhirjanyate na punaryayathānupratiṣṭhaḥ bījantu sati sahakārisākalye saṃdigdhe ni-(7)
1265:335: -ghananibandhanādhīnatvaṃ saśaṃsitasaṃbhāvanaṃ svahetunā janyata iti janyametat samastanyāyanīte|
1265:336: pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā|
1265:338: rūpe śleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sati kathaṃ bhavet|
1265:343: siddhāsiddhayorapekṣābhābādatyantasambhavī sambandhaḥ na siddhasyāsiddhaṃ kiñcidasti yadarthamapekṣyate yathā sāmānyātmanāsiddhaṃ viśeṣātmanārthamapekṣate aṅkurādiko bhāvaḥ niṣpattyaniṣpattivirudddharyādhyāsena bhinnatvāt siddhāsiddhavikalpānatikramāt tato na sahakārisāpekṣa-(2)
1265:344: balakṣapakṣādipadārthasārthasya sambhavaḥ svahetoḥ sambhāvanāspada nahi bhavati nijajanananigaḍaniyamita evāyaṃ naropasannamaunaniyama eva vācā vācaspati-(3)
1265:346: tasmātpramāṇaviruddha evārtho jñāpakena jñāpyate kāraka hetunā ca karaṇīya iti eṣa eva paramapramāṇikaḥ pracāraḥ|
1265:351: yathā śilāśakalamiti etadapi na sasāhityepi pararūpeṇa kartā ityetena gatārthaḥ|
1265:359: sa eva hi tasya nāsti yastajjanakaḥ|
1265:362: tu hetuḥ kṣaṇikatve kutaḥ sapakṣo jaladharaḥ sa ca sāśvadharmādhyāsito bodhanīyaḥ pramāṇena pramāṇañca prasaṅgaviparyaya tacca kiṃ vyāpāraṃ upapādyate|
1265:363: pūrvāparāvasthayoḥ karaṇākaraṇamadhyakṣaprekṣitaṃ lakṣyīkṛtya pramāṇāntarabādhādvā kādācitkānapekṣavat iti tarkopaniṣadācāryavacanādviruddhamekatve pūrvāparāvasthayorbījasya prānte prekṣitapratyekakartṛtvasya sādhayati karaṇākaraṇam|
1265:364: yasmādvirodhasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ samācakṣāṇaḥ parabhāga-(3)
1265:365: -bhāgī tatra sāmānlayakṣaṇamekadharmaṇyanavasthitiniyatatvaṃ tacca sāmānyaṃ vyaktidvayātmanā viśeṣī syāt|
1265:368: pratyakṣānupalambhapratyakṣāṇi sattā sādhyasiddhāni dvitīyasya punaranyonyabhedasiddhervā dhruvabhāvavināśavat pramāṇāntarabādhādvā|
1265:370: tatra tatkālaṃ kāritvamatatkālakāritvabhedena sidhyati viruddhaṃ na kālāntarākāritvena tadavacchede-(6)
1265:378: tyāśayā parasya ato yadaparamevamavādīt vādī tadapi dalitadardhamapasarpati sacivān|
1265:382: tathāpi tajjātīyamātra eveyaṃ vyavasthā na tvekasyāṃ vyaktau karaṇākaraṇalakṣaṇaviruddha dharmādhyāsasya (2)
1265:383: tathā ca tadasaṃnidhāne pratyakṣasiddhatayā tatra durvāratvāditi cet-na virodhasvarūpānavavodhāt|
1265:384: sa khalu dharmayoḥ parasparābhāvarūpatvaṃ vā syāt nityānityavat(3)
1265:385: dharmiṇi tadāpādakatvaṃ vā śītoṣṇatvavat tadvatā vā daṇḍitva kuṇḍalitvavat|
1265:389: yadāyadakaraṇaṃ hi tatkaraṇasyābhāvo na tvanyadā tatkaraṇasya na caitayorekadharmisamāveśamātiṣṭhāmahe|
1265:391: vavyatiriktayoḥ karaṇākaraṇāsiddheḥ vyāpārāparavyapadeśasahakāribhāvābhāvau hi karaṇākaraṇe kāryabhāvābhāvau vā|
1265:392: ati-(6)-rekasiddhāvapi svakāla evaṃ svābhāvapratikṣepavadakaraṇābhāvamākṣipet karaṇaṃ na tvanyadā|
1265:393: nahi yo yadā nāsti sa tadā svabhāvaṃ pratikṣeptumarha-(7)
1265:394: -ti, virodhyabhāvaṃ vā''kṣeptuṃ tathā sati na kadācidapi tatra syānna kadāpi tadvirodhī bhavediti|
1265:395: ‘nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sata’ iti āyātaṃ na vā viro -(8)
1265:396: -dha ityādikamatarkya tārkikatvaṃ arkakarasaṃparkakarkaśagāminopo mano na sāntvayati asarpāyopetatvādamīṣāmasadvikalpānām|
1265:399: kābhidhānam “stāṃ vā tathāpi na tābhyāṃ śakyāśakyayoravivakṣita kāla bheda eva virodhaḥ,
1265:402: yatsamartha tat karotyevetyupasaṃhartuṃ śakyamiti cet na kāla niyamāvivakṣāyāṃ yat samartha tat karotyeva kadācidit syāt|
1265:403: tathā ca sambhava vidheratyantā yogo viruddhaḥ,
1265:404: na tvayogaḥ nīlaṃ sarojaṃ bhavatyeveti vat iti|
1265:405: tadapi ayogo'tyantāyīgavyavacchedenāpi sarvadā bījasya satve sambhavantu katṛtvamityabhimatatvāt malinanalina-(2)
1265:410: prathamaṃ samarthasya nā paścāt tatra gataṃ naitadevaṃ tattatsahakārimataḥ (3)
1265:414: sahakāriṇaḥ svopasarppaṇa pratyayavaśādbhinnakālā ityarthāt kāryāṇāmapi bhinnakālateti tathāpyekakālastha eva bhāvo jāto naṣṭastadā kāryaṃ karotu utpannamā (5)
1265:416: ekadeśasthavaditi cet -seyamekakālatā svarūpakālāpekṣayā sahakārisāṃnidhyāpekṣayā vā ādye na kiñcidanupapannaṃ (6)
1265:418: vartamānaikarūpatvādbhavānāṃ tadeva tu kvacitsāvadhi kvacinniravadhīti viśeṣaḥ|
1265:421: dvitīyastu syādapi yadi teṣāṃ yaugapadyaṃ bhavet|
1265:425: tasmātkāryasya sa eva kālaḥ kāraṇasya sacānyaśceti sambandhikālāpekṣayā pūrvakālatā vyavahā-(9)-raḥ|
1265:426: etadapi sahakārisākalyaviśeṣaṇakaraṇanirākaraṇādalīkaṃ parikalpanamanalpaṃ śalyacakrasātabhājanam deśabhedena tu kartṛtvākartṛtvamupalabdhaṃ ānyākṣepaṃ upayanātmahasitasahacarañca na virodhatvādi (2)
1265:428: tenaiva sahakāreṇa tasyaiva tadaiva tathaiva sambaddhatvamasambaddhatvaṃ ca pūrvāparavelāyāmaniścita “astu tarhi tasyaiva tenaiva sahakāriṇa sahasambandho'sambandhaśceti (3)
1265:430: tathāhi sambandhinaḥ sambandhyantare svābhāvasvābhāvyaṃ vā virudhyeta,
1265:448: -gyaḥ svabhāvo bījasya nijo nāpaiti kadācana tadā svābhāvasvabhāvavatvamatṛṇahetuṃ kathamuktaṃ nānyat karmma iti|
1265:451: atha kādācitkaṃ tadrūpaṃ tadeva nirūpyatāṃ nibandhanaṃ ............... dipi yaḥ kimadhikeneti dhūrtatvena|
